resources.string: OilyTips
Done
This application is \'only\' a widget (like a Windows or Mac \'gadget\')"
Here\'s how to setup a widget on a tablet\n Step 1:\n>"
Here\'s how to setup a widget on a phone\n Step 1:\n>"
Instead of \"running\" widgets, you add them to your homescreen. To insert a widget, find a free place on your homescreen, then long-press in that place and select "Widgets" then "Oily Tips Widget".
Tap on the OilyTip to expand the tip in a larger window. You can follow the footnote references to the sources or background information for some the tips.

When you have an OilyTips widget installed, it will update its tip once a day and will periodically download new tips from our server. Other than that, the OilyTips widget does not consume any system resources, data or battery.

The Young Living blend Purification takes the sting out of fire ant bites.
For babies, use Lemon oil along the spine for a fever
For babies, use Myrtle oil for congestion

Lavender is the Swiss Army knife in your essential oil toolkit - anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-fungal!

Thieves Spray is a great way to stop the flu before it starts!
Use the Young Living blend R.C. for respiratory problems. Rub topically on chest and diffuse.
